CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 54,55 In contrast , PIDT-C12NT based blend film displayed an interpenetrating bicontinuous network between polymer and PC71BM with optimal domain size of 10-20 nm that is pretty favorable for efficient diffusion of excitons to donor - acceptor interface.

Let's think step by step.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 54,55 In contrast , PIDT-C12NT based blend film displayed an interpenetrating bicontinuous network between polymer and PC71BM with optimal domain size of 10-20 nm that is pretty favorable for efficient diffusion of excitons to donor - acceptor interface.

Let's think step by step.

1. PIDT-C12NT (polymer)
2. blend film (property of the polymer and PC71BM)
3. interpenetrating bicontinuous network (property of the blend film)
4. polymer (component of the blend film)
5. PC71BM (component of the blend film)
6. optimal domain size (property of the network)
7. 10-20 nm (value of the optimal domain size)
8. excitons (particles that can be affected by the property of the network)
9. donor-acceptor interface (property of the network)
10. efficient diffusion (property of the excitons)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. interpenetrating bicontinuous network (property of the blend film)
2. optimal domain size (property of the network)
3. efficient diffusion (property of the excitons)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| interpenetrating bicontinuous network |
| optimal domain size |
| efficient diffusion |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 54,55 In contrast , PIDT-C12NT based blend film displayed an interpenetrating bicontinuous network between polymer and PC71BM with optimal domain size of 10-20 nm that is pretty favorable for efficient diffusion of excitons to donor - acceptor interface.

Let's think step by step.

1. "an interpenetrating bicontinuous network" - This phrase refers to the structure or property of the blend film, but it is not a specific "Property Value" entity.
2. "optimal domain size" - This is a property value entity, where the optimal domain size is specified as 10-20 nm.
3. "efficient diffusion" - This phrase refers to the process or property of the excitons, but it is not a specific "Property Value" entity.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* Optimal domain size of 10-20 nm.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Optimal domain size of 10-20 nm |
